title: Deshaun Watson suspended 11 games
description:
Adam Schefter, Mina Kimes, Field Yates, Jake Trotter, and Keyshawn Johnson with the latest on Deshaun Watson, Laura Rutledge and Dan Orlovsky bring the latest ahead of the pregame showdown of the Bears at the Seahawks.
